messages.title: A Strong Voice for Our Area
messages.content: Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are fighting for Britain's membership of the European Union and for your say on the final Brexit deal.
The Liberal Democrats have a costed plan to end the crisis in health and social care by raising income tax to provide an additional £6 billion in funding.
Local schools are under threat from cuts by the Conservative Party, affecting teachers and students in Hertfordshire.

issues.brexitEurope: We oppose the ideological 'hard Brexit' agenda currently being pursued.
issues.economy: It will hurt our economy and endanger jobs. Poorest families will be hit hardest.
issues.education: Local schools are set to lose nearly £76 million from their budgets due to cuts.
issues.health: Only the Liberal Democrats have a realistic and costed plan to end the crisis in health and social care.

community.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people.

images.caption: Hugh Annand and the Liberal Democrats
Change the direction of the country on Thursday June 8th 2017

examples: Over 60% of voters in Hitchin and Harpenden backed 'Remain' in last year's referendum.
Local schools are set to lose nearly £76 million from their budgets.
We oppose the ideological 'hard Brexit' agenda currently being pursued.
Poorest families will be hit hardest.
Local people are suffering due to school cuts.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people.
Local schools are set to lose nearly £76 million from their budgets due to cuts.
Hugh Annand will fight for you on Brexit, schools, and our health services.
Only the Liberal Democrats have a realistic and costed plan to end the crisis in health and social care.
We oppose the ideological 'hard Brexit' agenda currently being pursued.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people.
Theresa May's government and our local Conservative MP have completely ignored those concerns.
